Object Parameters: Sand shake wave length. 0 by default if s1 = 0
Time until sand wave reaches the end. 0 by default if s1 = 0. Must not be 0 if s1 = 1
Description:
Thwomp Desert controller.
Arena [[slot]] 1.5 enables its SFX.
{{obj-ref|s_itembox}} is affected by the push/pull factor on slots other than arena slot 1.5, causing buggy interactions. Cannot be scaled, due to hard-coded collision.
